<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_servicenow_s_servicenow_scripting">
    <x_snc_servicenow_s_servicenow_scripting action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <code_url/>
        <code_url_2/>
        <details/>
        <example_steps/>
        <example_url/>
        <module/>
        <number>SNSCRIPT0001158</number>
        <replaced_by/>
        <script>Calculation:
var values = [current.manufacturer.getDisplayValue(),current.name,current.version];
var display_name = "";

for (var x=0;x<values.length;x++) {
  if (values[x] != undefined && values[x] != "") {
    display_name = display_name + ' ' + values[x];
  }
}

current.display_name = display_name.trim();</script>
        <script_2/>
        <script_type/>
        <short_description>To derive a display name from other fields</short_description>
        <state>Submitted</state>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2016-08-28 19:38:13</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>9842fb4513296240e5adbd522244b0d7</sys_id>

        <sys_updated_on>2016-08-28 19:38:13</sys_updated_on>
        <tested_on_helsinki/>
    </x_snc_servicenow_s_servicenow_scripting>
</record_update>
